original_text:
Mystical Lamp
Aladino e il genio della lampada è una di quelle favole entrate di diritto nel cuore di ogni persona, al di là della provenienza geografica o dell’età. Racchiusa nel libro Le mille e una notte, è la storia di Aladino, un ragazzo povero che si imbatte in una lampada magica in cui è rinchiuso un genio in grado di esaudire qualsiasi desiderio. Dopo molte peripezie e in compagnia di Abu, la scimmietta sua amica, e grazie all’utilizzo di un tappeto volante, Aladino riuscirà a sconfiggere il mago Maghreb e a sposare la principessa.
Come ogni slot SimplePlay, anche Mystical Lamp ha una grafica invidiabile, con simboli definiti al dettaglio e animazioni di livello a seguito di ogni vincita.
Lo sfondo è il palazzo reale e la griglia è incastonata in due colonne dallo stile orientale. Conclude il tutto una bella musica orientaleggiante a tenerci compagnia durante i nostri Spin.
Caratteristiche della slot
Il taglio classico della griglia di gioco prevede 5 rulli e 3 righe. I modi per vincere sono 243.
La puntata minima è di 0,20 monete a salire, tutto sommato una cifra contenuta che ci permette di effettuare numerosi Spins senza doverci svenare.
Per chi non ha voglia di cliccare ogni volta sul tasto Start, può optare per la funzione Autoplay, con un numero di giri automatici compreso tra 50 e 1.000.
Agendo sull’icona del fulmine si può accelerare la rotazione dei rulli.
La volatilità è media, si vince meno spesso ma le somme sono sempre alte, mentre il valore RTP è molto buono, essendo pari al 96,09%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Le carte da gioco sono i simboli con il valore più basso, a seguire troviamo il tappeto, la lampada, Adu, Maghreb e la principessa.
Il genio della lampada è il nostro simbolo Wild e appare soltanto sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e va a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter. Quando compare durante i giri gratuiti, moltiplica la scommessa totale di 1, 2, 5 o 10 volte.
Lo Scatter è rappresentato dallo scrigno. Come il simbolo Wild, in base al numero di simboli atterrato sui rulli, moltiplica la scommessa x2, x5 o x25.
Inoltre, regala dei giri gratuiti, ma il numero dipenderà da noi. Infatti, sullo schermo vedremo apparire la grotta disseminata di lampade magiche. Noi ne dovremo scegliere cinque e svelare così il numero di Free Spins che si cela sotto di esse.

raw_translation.response:
"Mystical Lamp"

Aladdin and the genie of the lamp is a story that has rightfully entered the heart of every person, regardless of their geographical origin or age. Enclosed in the book One Thousand and One Nights, it is the tale of Aladdin, a poor boy who comes across a magical lamp containing a genie capable of fulfilling any wish. After many adventures and with the company of Abu, his monkey friend, and thanks to the use of a magic carpet, Aladdin manages to defeat the magician Maghreb and marry the princess.

Like every SimplePlay slot, Mystical Lamp boasts an enviable graphics display, with symbols defined down to the last detail and high-quality animations following every win. The background is the royal palace, and the grid is embedded in two columns of Eastern-style. To complete the experience, a beautiful oriental music keeps us company during our spins.

Slot Features

The classic layout of the game grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 243 ways to win. The minimum bet is 0.20 coins and going up, which is a relatively small amount that allows us to make many spins without breaking the bank. 

For those who don't feel like clicking on the start button every time, the Autoplay function is available, with an automatic spin range between 50 and 1,000. You can accelerate the rotation of the reels by clicking on the lightning icon. The volatility is average, winning less often but with high sums; and the RTP value is very good, being equal to 96.09%. 

Symbols and Features

The card games are the symbols with the lowest value; following them are the carpet, lamp, Adu, Maghreb, and the princess. The genie of the lamp is our Wild symbol and appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, replacing all symbols except the Scatter. When it appears during free spins, it multiplies the total bet by 1, 2, 5, or 10 times.

The Scatter symbol is represented by a chest. Like the Wild symbol, depending on the number of symbols, it multiplies the bet x2, x5, or x25. Furthermore, it grants free spins, but the number depends on us. In fact, on the screen, we will see a cave scattered with magic lamps. We must choose five and thus reveal the number of free spins hidden under them.

After many adventures and with the company of Abu, his monkey friend, and thanks to the use of a magic carpet, Aladdin manages to defeat the magician Maghreb and marry the princess.

You can accelerate the rotation of the reels by clicking on the lightning icon. The volatility is average, winning less often but with high sums; and the RTP value is very good, being equal to 96.09%.

The card games are the symbols with the lowest value; following them are the carpet, lamp, Adu, Maghreb, and the princess. Review: "Mystical Lamp"

Aladdin and the genie of the lamp is a story that has rightfully entered the heart of every person, regardless of their geographical origin or age. Enclosed in the book One Thousand and One Nights, it is the tale of Aladdin, a poor boy who comes across a magical lamp containing a genie capable of fulfilling any wish. After many adventures and with the company of Abu, his monkey friend, and thanks to the use of a magic carpet, Aladdin manages to defeat the magician Maghreb and marry the princess.

Like every SimplePlay slot, Mystical Lamp boasts an enviable graphics display, with symbols defined down to the last detail and high-quality animations following every win. The background is the royal palace, and the grid is embedded in two columns of Eastern-style. To complete the experience, a beautiful oriental music keeps us company during our spins.

Slot Features

The classic layout of the game grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 243 ways to win. The minimum bet is 0.20 coins and going up, which is a relatively small amount that allows us to make many spins without breaking the bank. 

For those who don't feel like clicking on the start button every time, the Autoplay function is available, with an automatic spin range between 50 and 1,000. You can accelerate the rotation of the reels by clicking on the lightning icon. The volatility is average, winning less often but with high sums; and the RTP value is very good, being equal to 96.09%. 

Symbols and Features

The card games are the symbols with the lowest value; following them are the carpet, lamp, Adu, Maghreb, and the princess. The genie of the lamp is our Wild symbol and appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, replacing all symbols except the Scatter. When it appears during free spins, it multiplies the total bet by 1, 2, 5, or 10 times.

The Scatter symbol is represented by a chest. Like the Wild symbol, depending on the number of symbols, it multiplies the bet x2, x5, or x25. Furthermore, it grants free spins, but the number depends on us. In fact, on the screen, we will see a cave scattered with magic lamps. We must choose five and thus reveal the number of free spins hidden under them.

Mystical Lamp is inspired by the classic story of Aladdin and the genie of the lamp from One Thousand and One Nights. It follows the adventures of Aladdin and his companions and replicates the setting in an oriental-style palace. The theme of the game features the genie of the lamp, magic carpets, and mysterious caves with magical lamps.

Betting system

Mystical Lamp has a small minimum bet of 0.20 coins, which allows players to make many spins without breaking the bank. The Autoplay function is also available, allowing players to spin the reels automatically between 50 and 1,000 times. The game's volatility is moderate with high sums received after each win, and the RTP value is excellent at 96.09%.

Review: "Mystical Lamp"

Aladdin and the genie of the lamp is a story that has rightfully entered the heart of every person, regardless of their geographical origin or age. Enclosed in the book One Thousand and One Nights, it is the tale of Aladdin, a poor boy who comes across a magical lamp containing a genie capable of fulfilling any wish. After many adventures and with the company of Abu, his monkey friend, and thanks to the use of a magic carpet, Aladdin manages to defeat the magician Maghreb and marry the princess.

Like every SimplePlay slot, Mystical Lamp boasts an enviable graphics display, with symbols defined down to the last detail and high-quality animations following every win. The background is the royal palace, and the grid is embedded in two columns of Eastern-style. To complete the experience, a beautiful oriental music keeps us company during our spins.

Slot Features

The classic layout of the game grid consists of 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 243 ways to win. The minimum bet is 0.20 coins and going up, which is a relatively small amount that allows us to make many spins without breaking the bank. 

For those who don't feel like clicking on the start button every time, the Autoplay function is available, with an automatic spin range between 50 and 1,000. You can accelerate the rotation of the reels by clicking on the lightning icon. The volatility is average, winning less often but with high sums; and the RTP value is very good, being equal to 96.09%. 

Symbols and Features

The card games are the symbols with the lowest value; following them are the carpet, lamp, Adu, Maghreb, and the princess. The genie of the lamp is our Wild symbol and appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, replacing all symbols except the Scatter. When it appears during free spins, it multiplies the total bet by 1, 2, 5, or 10 times.

The Scatter symbol is represented by a chest. Like the Wild symbol, depending on the number of symbols, it multiplies the bet x2, x5, or x25. Furthermore, it grants free spins, but the number depends on us. In fact, on the screen, we will see a cave scattered with magic lamps. We must choose five and thus reveal the number of free spins hidden under them.
